text:
Tread | Toronto, Ontario, Canada | Full-Time | ONSITE | https://tread.io/

Tread, we are a technology company building software for the construction industry. We are looking for multiple solid software engineers who will help us disrupt the construction space. Our primary stack is React / Go / GraphQL / Postgres, with iOS and Android apps. If you are interested in learning more, reach us at careers at tread.io or you can check out our AngelList - https://angel.co/tread/jobs.

We are a Techstars 2018 Toronto company.
